text: Screen Gems is an American movie studio founded in 1999. It is owned by Sony Pictures. ==History== It was founded in 1929 as an animation studio, and shut down in 1949. It was revived as a television unit of Columbia Pictures in the 1950s. It was a movie studio since 1999, and is now known for making a lot of horror movies or cheap comedy movies. ==Logo in 2011== Buffy Cuttler decided to create a Screen Gems logo for the upcoming film Friends with Benefits in 2011. He created the logo by having a cloud background with the 1965 Screen Gems logo on it. Category:1999 establishments in the United States Category:American movie studios
title: Screen Gems
